0.text: Innate: Ryze gains (10% per 100 AP)  maximum mana.
Passive: Ryze's other basic ability casts  reset Overload's cooldown and charge a  Rune stack that lasts 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent casts and stacks up to 2 times.

1.text: Active: Ryze unleashes a runic blast in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and consumes all  Rune stacks.

2.text: If Ryze consumed 2 stacks, he gains  bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.

3.text: Flux Bonus: Overload deals 10 / 40 / 70 / 100% (based on  Realm Warp's Rank)  increased damage and spreads to surrounding Fluxed enemies.

0.text: Active: Ryze seizes the target enemy, dealing magic damage and  slowing them by 35% for 1.5 seconds.

1.text: Flux Bonus: The target is  rooted instead of  slowed.

0.text:
Active: Ryze projects an orb upon the target enemy that deals magic damage.
The target and surrounding enemies are also marked with Flux for 3 seconds. Ryze's basic abilities against Flux targets consume the mark to become empowered with an additional effect.

1.text: Flux Bonus: Spell Flux spreads farther.

0.text: Passive:  Overload's  Flux empowered damage is increased.

1.text: Active: Ryze  channels for 2 seconds to open a portal beneath him, marking the target location as its destination and gaining  sight of the area. Ryze is able to act while channeling, but the portal will cancel if he is  interrupted.

2.text: Upon completion, Ryze and allied units within will  blink to the location and become  rooted,  disarmed,  silenced and  untargetable for 0.75 seconds.

3.text: Realm Warp will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Stats

+240 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge and grants 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if it's a champion, up to maximum of 360 bonus mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.
consume.originText: Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Glaciate: Unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, dealing 100 (+ 30% AP) magic damage to all enemies hit and slowing them by 65% for 1 second. Enemies struck in the center of the cone are rooted for the same duration instead (30 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – GLACIATE: Unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, dealing 100 (+ 30% AP) magic damage to all enemies hit and  slowing them by 65% for 1 second. Enemies struck in the center of the cone are  rooted for the same duration instead (30 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

passive.originText: MYTHIC PASSIVE: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10 ability power.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants ability haste equal to 0.5% bonus mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge and grants 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if it's a champion, up to a maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +360 mana.
